---
name: Wiki request
description: Request adding a new wiki to Madbot's supported list
title: "[Wiki request] "
labels: ["wiki-request"]
assignees: ""
---

<!-- This template is used by automation to open a PR that adds your wiki. Please fill in every section. -->

## Wiki code (short tag)

The tag users will pick in the `/wiki` command (e.g. `ma`, `sgc`, `b5`). Use lowercase letters and numbers only.

<!-- e.g. mywiki -->

## Display name

The full name of the wiki as it should appear in the bot (e.g. "Memory Alpha", "The Babylon Project").

<!-- e.g. My Fandom Wiki -->

## Base URL

The wiki's base URL **without** a trailing slash. For Fandom: `https://yoursite.fandom.com`.

<!-- e.g. https://mywiki.fandom.com -->

## Short label (for Discord)

A short label shown in the wiki dropdown (e.g. "Star Trek", "Stargate", "Babylon 5").

<!-- e.g. My Fandom -->
